actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to establish the Veterans' Administration as an executive department to be known as the "Department of Veterans' Affairs".

summary.text: Establishes the Veterans' Administration as an executive department to be known as the Department of Veterans' Affairs. Redesignates the Administrator and Deputy Administrator of Veterans' Affairs as the Secretary and Deputy Secretary of Veterans' Affairs, respectively. Makes this Act effective at such time as designated by the President by Executive Order.

titles.title: A bill to establish the Veterans' Administration as an executive department to be known as the "Department of Veterans' Affairs".
